alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 2:27PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with locally higher amounts up to 30 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
